itinerary.title: Day 1 - Arrival in Singapore
itinerary.subtitle: Arrival at Singapore airport and take a taxi to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Day 2 - Singapore: Golf at Marina Bay Golf Club
itinerary.subtitle: Golf at Marina Bay Golf Club - a challenging and interesting golf course not far from the city.

itinerary.title: Day 3 - Singapore: Golf at Warren Golf Club
itinerary.subtitle: Golf at Warren Golf Club â€“ a very enjoyable and at times testing layout adjacent to one of the tributaries of the Kranji Reservoir.

itinerary.title: Day 4 - Bintan: Golf at Ria Bintan
itinerary.subtitle: Take the ferry to Bintan and transfer to Ria Bintan - a truly stunning course which will delight the golfing connoisseur.

itinerary.title: Day 5 - Bintan: Golf at Laguna Golf Bintan. Departure
itinerary.subtitle: Play golf today at Laguna Golf Bintan - a recently renovated Greg Norman creation. After your round take the ferry back to Singapore. Take a taxi to Singapore Changi Airport for departure.
